<h1 align="center">
  Neil's "Hello Tailwind" Starter
</h1>

Kick off your project with this hello-world boilerplate. It speeds up my process of developing a Gatsby site.

## What Packages are Included?

The following packages are included so you don't have to type them all in

### Styles & UI

1. TailwindCSS
2. HeadlessUI (By Tailwind)
3. React Icons

### Plugins

1. Google Gtag
2. Image
3. MDX
4. PostCSS
5. React Helmet
6. Sharp
7. Sitemap

### Source

1. Filesystem

### Transformer

1. Sharp
